required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Room 4 Birth - An Adaptable Birthing Room and the Effect on Labour and Birth
clinical_study.official_title: Room 4 Birth - An Adaptable Birthing Room and the Effect on Labour and Birth: A Randomised Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Healthcare Environment influences health outcomes. The effects of physical aspects of the birthing room on maternal and neonatal outcomes is insufficiently studied. This study will measure and compare effects and experiences of two types of birthing rooms.

detailed_description.textblock: Healthcare Environment influences health outcomes. The effects of physical aspects of the birthing room on maternal and neonatal outcomes is insufficiently studied. This RCT project measures and compares effects and experiences of two types of birthing rooms at one Labour ward in Sweden. A qualitative ethnografic studu will assess how women interact with the birthing rooms and its physical objects.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Decreased stress, increased parasympathisuc, increased physiological oxytocin promotes a normal healthy Labour and birth.

primary_outcome.measure: Composite outcome of four variables - Use of oxytocin (Y/N); Spontaneous vaginal birth (Y/N); Normal postpartum haemorrhage (Y/N); Self-rated childbirth experience
primary_outcome.description: Use of oxytocin for augmentation of Labour, Spontaneous vaginal birth, normal Postpartum haemorrhage, Childbirth experience

arm_group.description: An adaptable, person-centered, birthing room that is specially designed.

intervention.description: The design of the room is based on scientific evidence on the healthcare environment in general, and on a systematic review on the effect of birthing rooms published by the investigators, and interviews with women early after birth in Sweden. The room has a large birthing pool, several lighting options with dimming function, 40 mm suspended sound absorber in the ceiling, media installation covering two walls, which offers a choice of six different programmed nature scenes with light, sound effect and Music.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- pregnant women
- Robson 1 classified, i.e. nulliparous, single Pregnancy >37 weeks, cephalic presentation, sponatanous Labour start
- speak, understand Swedish, English, arabic or somali or have an interpreter present
- Active phase of Labour: 2 of these 3 criteria fulfilled: sponatanous rupture of membranes, 2-3 painful contractions in 10 minutes; cervix dilated >3-4 cm or effaced and open >1cm
Exclusion Criteria:
- induced Labour
- planned caesarean section
- multiple gestation
- lack of informed written consent
- not Speaking Swedish, Egmnlish, Arabic or Somali
